definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: castle, palace (late & prob. loan-word; cf. As bîrtu, fortress Dl:HA 22; Pers. bâru = Skr. bura, bari, v. Ry Ne 2:8)—
of temple at Jerusalem 1Ch 29:1, 1Ch 29:19 [[הַבִּירָת]]; of for-tress near temple Ne 2:8, Ne 7:2 (cf. ba=riv LXXL Ne 1:1, Ne 2:8, Ne 7:2—B a(bira/, beira/—and later ba=riv Jos:Ant. xv. 11, 4).

[[בְּשׁוּשַׁן הַבִּירָה]] Ne 1:1, Es 1:2, Es 1:5, Es 2:3, Es 2:5, Es 2:8, Es 3:15, Es 8:14, Es 9:6, Es 9:11, Es 9:12, Da 8:2; in these passages it appar. means a fortress in the city bearing the same name (cf. esp. Es 3:15, Es 8:14, Es 8:15, Es 9:6, Es 9:12, Es 9:15, Es 9:18).
